item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal and professional webpage. (I am a personal and a professional person.) I teach American literature at Vilnius University. I try to improve my classes, my research, and my personal brand, as I can. I recently finished a dissertation on literatureâ€™s intersection with geographic knowledge-production in nineteenth-century America. It features chapters on Charles Brockden Brown, Margaret Fuller, and Emily Dickinson. I take photographs. I sometimes post here.
